name: Anikesh Gupta
shotdesc: Outstanding service at Swagat Hotel! A memorable experience for comfort and luxury.
longdescription: Had an amazing experience at Swagat Hotel. The Amber Lastir room was beautifully designed with modern amenities. The staff were friendly, and the gourmet breakfast was delicious.

name: Rajesh Patel
shotdesc: Swagat Hotel delivers exceptional service! A perfect blend of luxury and convenience.
longdescription: I was thoroughly impressed with my stay at Swagat Hotel. The room was comfortable and well-equipped with modern amenities. The staff were attentive, ensuring a pleasant experience.

name: Prem Sharma
shotdesc: Outstanding service at Swagat Hotel! A memorable experience for comfort and luxury.
longdescription: My experience at Swagat Hotel was fantastic. The room was spacious and comfortable, with impressive amenities. The staff were friendly and attentive, ensuring a memorable stay.

name: Ananya Kumar
shotdesc: Outstanding service at Swagat Hotel! A memorable experience for comfort and luxury.
longdescription: Swagat Hotel exceeded my expectations. The room was impeccably clean and well-maintained. The staff were professional and courteous, making my stay truly enjoyable.
